sentences.sContent: ...I can definitely remember what I learned on certain days at school...
...she became interested in eggs and learned the traditional Ukrainian technique to draw her very modem characters...
...Dogs may have learned to detect threat signs from humans and respond by trying to make peace...
...This behavior may have evolved as dogs gradually learned they could benefit from avoiding conflicts with humans...
...having learned the art from her Ukrainian relatives...
...I’ve actually just learned of this concept myself...
...I was excited when I learned this...
...I am eager to apply what I’ve learned to practice since I have got so many years’ schooling...
...Participation in this project helped the girls developed a new attitude towards their appearance of their own homes;they've learned how to work with tools...
...I've learned a lot from the project...

synos.tran: 博学的；有学问的；学术上的

phrases.pCn: 经验教训；教训总结；取得的教训
习得性无助；学习性无力感

trans.tranOther: a learned person has a lot of knowledge because they have read and studied a lot
